items.preText: sarat: "Unlike in T20Is, In ODIs u have to respect bowlers and the pitch atleast for 5-6 overs"
items.text: leans into the ball on the off side to push it into the covers
items.postText: 11.18am And the rain has become heavier, the players are going off and the covers are coming on. It's not too heavy, so only the pitch has been covered and it's almost stopped now in fact. The umpires are walking on the field with their hands in the pockets, no need for umbrellas yet
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: 11.29am The umpires are walking out now, followed by the New Zealand players and the two left-handers from Bangladesh. Those batsmen have a tough task ahead in these overcast conditions, Boult is making the ball swing around as usual. Henry to continue... 11.25am Good news - the covers are coming off quickly. It's still pretty overcast and chilly, little windy at times.
items.text: on length around middle and off, Tamim closes the bat a bit awkwardly to defend it to leg
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pulls the length a bit shorter and that gives Tamim some time to tuck it to leg for one
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.preText: Naim Noor Arnob: "An absolute nothing shot from Liton. He must be dropped for a seamer who can bring goods under these conditions." They need some batting depth too in these conditions
items.text: back of length on the stumps and he steers it to third man
items.shortText: Henry to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: similar length around 132kmh, on the off stump this time and he defends it back
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: stifled appeal from Henry as he brings the ball in from middle, hits Tamim on the thigh pad. There was bounce there and probably going down leg too
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: slightly wide outside off with the outswing, left alone easily
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: fuller now and closer to off, pushed straight to cover point  without much footwork
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: short ball at 138kmh, it's headed towards his head and he adjusts well to pull that behind square, while taking his eyes off the ball, but does enough to beat fine leg for the first four of the morning
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: shaping away a little, pushed nicely into the covers again
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: back of length this time on off, good bounce and he defends it off the back foot to point
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: nice and teasing line outside off with the away swing, but he lets it go
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.preText: Matt Henry has been bowling under 140kmh, and a bit short of length unlike Boult who has looked much better today
items.text: back of length on middle, he stays back and defends it back to Henry
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: much louder appeal than the one in his previous over, the umpire says no and NZ decide not to review. It was a close call but might have pitched outside leg. It pitched just outside leg, the replay confirms, and straightened just a bit to clip leg stump
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: goes back because of the shorter length and is surprised by the bounce outside off while defending into the covers
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: puts his weight on the front foot a bit and the inswing takes a thick inside edge to leg
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: much closer lbw shout, looked like it pitched in line and is headed for the stumps, the finger goes up soon enough and Tamim reviews it. No inside edge there, fair gap actually, and ball-tracking says it has pitched in line, and it has straightened enough to just clip the top of the stumps so the decision stays out but Bangladesh do not lose their review because of the umpire's call
items.shortText: Henry to Tamim Iqbal, OUT

dismissal.text: Tamim Iqbal lbw b Henry 5 (29m 28b 0x4 0x6) SR: 17.85

items.preText: In his 200th ODI, here's Mushfiqur Rahim
items.text: right on target with the length ball on middle, he blocks it with a straight bat
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: nice outswing from wide of the crease, Soumya doesn't move his feet much and drives into the covers
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: drives on the up and just over cover point. This one was swinging away too, again minimal footwork while driving the ball away and that just about evaded the fielder on the off side for two
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

items.text: sends in a bouncer this time and Soumya lets it go easily
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: pitches it up nicely and there's swing too, Soumya digs it out to drive into the covers
items.shortText: Boult to Soumya Sarkar, 1 run

items.text: pitching on leg and swinging in, Mushfiqur takes it on the body as he's cramped for room
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: 140kmh, full around off, hint of inswing and he drives that down the ground nicely with a straight bat. That's straight enough to go to the right of mid-off for three
items.shortText: Boult to Mushfiqur Rahim, 3 runs

items.text: ooh risky leave that from Mushfiqur. I wonder if he left that on length - it was just short of length around off and nipped in a bit to go just over the off stump
items.shortText: Henry to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
